snippet: Revisiting his 1982 project, the choreographer Ishmael Houston-Jones was the guest curator for Platform 2012: “Parallels,” which started with works by dance artists from a younger generation.
abstract: Gia Kourlas reviews premieres of dance pieces Frontispieces and Synthetic Action, choreographed and performed by Will Rawls and Isabel Lewis as part of the Parallels series, programmed by choreographer Ishmael Houston-Jones, at the Danspace Project.
lead_paragraph: Revisiting his 1982 project, the choreographer Ishmael Houston-Jones was the guest curator for Platform 2012: “Parallels,” which started with works by dance artists from a younger generation.
